titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Ms. Coll. 960 Item 7: Risālat Aḥmad ibn Mūsá ibn Aḥmad ilá al-qāḍiyayn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad wa-Ḥamīd Bannānī ḥawla sharḥ al-Iḥyāʼ

notesStmt.note: Probably written in Morocco, in Maghribi script.

msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts

msContents.summary: Letter from Aḥmad bin Mūsá bin Aḥmad, Vizier of al-Sulṭān al-Ḥasan al-Awwal, concerning Fez lithographs.

msItem.title: Risālat Aḥmad ibn Mūsá ibn Aḥmad ilá al-qāḍiyayn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad wa-Ḥamīd Bannānī ḥawla sharḥ al-Iḥyāʼ
رسالة أحمد بن موسى بن أحمد إلى القاضيين محمد بن محمد وحميد بناني حول شرح الإحياء

author.name: Allan G. Chester and Florence K. Chester Fund

msItem.title: Risālat Aḥmad ibn Mūsá ibn Aḥmad ilá al-qāḍiyayn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad wa-Ḥamīd Bannānī ḥawla sharḥ al-Iḥyāʼ, A.H. 1312 (1895).

history.provenance: Sold as part of the Fez Lithographs Collection by Fawzi Abdulrazak (Cambridge, Massachusetts), 2013.
